abstract: The social network routinely invites users to nostalgically review older timeline posts, but not everyone wants to be reminded of the past.
snippet: The social network routinely invites users to nostalgically review older timeline posts, but not everyone wants to be reminded of the past.
lead_paragraph: Q. Facebook has taken it upon itself to notify me of “memories” of my past posts, but some of these updates are painful, especially when photos of people or pets who have died appear on my computer screen. Is there any way to turn this off?
